August 2, 1954
Mr* Lewis Hill
P* 0. Box #16
Duncans Mills, California
Dear Mr* Hill:
Dr* Skornia will be on vacation until the first of September,
so I am replying to your letter of July 30*
Normally disbursements made in connection with grants such
as this are handled by Mr* Frank E# Schooley, Director of
University Broadcasting, University of Illinois, Urban*,
Illinois, who is Treasurer of the MSB, and I presume this
grant will be handled the same way*
However, Mr* Schooley is also on vacation until about the
first of September, so I am unable to check with him regard¬
ing this particular grant* I would suggest that you address
your bills to Mr# Schooley, as NAEB Treasurer, at 227 Greg¬
ory Hall, Urbana, Illinois*
This matter will be called to Mr* Skomi*,s attention upon
his return and he will advise you further at that time. If,
in the meantime, you have any other questions please let me
know and we will make every effort to be of assistance.
Sincerely,
HBHscp
Harold E* Hill
Associate Director
